description.pt-br: A cortina sobe e o arco do segundo ano dessa série extremamente popular começa!Quando Kiyotaka Ayanokouji e seus colegas de classe começam seu segundo ano, mudanças são vistas em toda a Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School. Com a graduação do terceiro ano e a entrada do primeiro ano na escola, as alianças estão bem encaminhadas. Além disso, agora que Miyabi Nagumo é o presidente do conselho estudantil, a promessa de transformar a escola em uma baseada meritocracia pode se tornar uma realidade. Enquanto isso, os conflitos entre as classes continuam a crescer à medida que o total de pontos da classe se aproxima. Com outro exame especial se aproximando, Ayanokouji permanecerá nas sombras, ou ele finalmente entrará nos holofotes e ajudará sua classe a subir para a ilustre Classe A?

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
description.es-la: Eugene procede de una familia de famosos espadachines, pero es tachado de "espadachín defectuoso" Que a pesar de poseer extraordinarias habilidades defensivas su poder ofensivo es basura. Abandona su país y se matricula en la principal escuela del continente, la Academia de Magia. En la academia, le piden a Eugene que vaya a lo más profundo de la prisión sellada, donde se se encuentran criaturas míticas y él es el único al que no afecta el miasma que estas desprenden. Sellado en las profundidades más oscuras de la prisión, donde incluso los más grandes magos de todos los tiempos caen de rodillas en el camino, se encuentra a la legendaria Rey Demonio Erinyes, que una vez gobernó el continente. Eugene llega fácilmente hasta ella, y ¿Parece que es el único que puede hacer un contrato con la Rey Demonio...? Una historia fantástica de otro mundo en la que un espadachín caído que se ha hecho con el poder del Rey Demonio ¡se convierte en el santo de la espada más fuerte! ¡Una historia que transcurre en el mismo universo de Shinja Zero Megami!

description.en: 36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together.
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.

description.en:
A secret that I, a maid of the imperial palace, accidentally heard… That the runaway fiancée of the prince was actually a man?!

"Please spare my life! I'll do anything!"

"Anything?"

As I desperately nodded my head, the prince gave a chilling smile. There's only one way to not get silenced permanently!

"Then I choose you."

"For what?"

"To be my fiancée."

To become the fiancée (replacement) of the prince.

---
I, who was merely a maid at the royal palace, heard the Crown Prince’s secret by accident. The Crown Prince's fiancée who ran away was actually a man?!

"Please spare me! I'll do anything!"

"Anything?"

The answer I gave in order to survive, the promise that I would do anything, was the beginning of my misery.

"You do it then."

"Do what?"

"Be my fiancée."

There’s only one way to escape death! It's to become the Crown Prince’s fiancée?!!!

"I'll only let you live if you safely survive the party two weeks from now."

I held on while trusting the Crown Prince's words. I got through the ball without any issues but… Why isn't he letting me go?

"Now that he's coming back, I should leave, right?"

"Under whose discretion?"

I thought I was just a substitute.

"You can't go anywhere. You're now my only fiancée."

Why are you… saying that?!!!! I just did my best in order to stay alive… But I ended up touching the Crown Prince's heart?! Atienne's sweet and fierce survival at the royal palace!!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53709175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8356103)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%ED%83%9C%EC%9E%90%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%BD%ED%98%BC%EB%85%80/3080), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60511921)
description.ko:
일개 황궁 시녀였던 내가 우연히 들어 버린 황태자의 비밀.
도망친 황태자의 약혼녀가 사실은 남자였다?!

“살려 주세요! 뭐든 다 할게요!”
“뭐든?”

살기 위해 했던 그 대답,
뭐든지 다 하겠다는 약속으로 인해 불행이 시작되었다.

“그럼 너로 하자.”
“뭘 해요?”
“내 약혼녀.”

살해당할 위기에서 벗어날 방법은 단 하나!
내가 황태자의 약혼녀인 척하라고?!!!

“2주 후 파티만 무사히 치르면 살려 줄게.”

황태자의 그 말만 믿고 열심히 버텼다.
그렇게 무사히 무도회를 치렀는데……
왜 놓아준다는 말이 없지?

“이제 그분도 돌아오실 테니 전 떠나야겠죠.”
“누구 마음대로?”

나는 그저 대역인 줄로만 알았는데.

“넌 아무 데도 못 가. 이제 내 약혼녀는 너뿐이니까.”
얘기가… 왜 그렇게 흘러가는 거죠?!!!

그저 어떻게든 살아남기 위해 몸부림쳤을 뿐인데…
황태자의 마음에 스며들어버렸다?!

아티엔느의 달콤살벌한 황궁에서 살아남기!!

_

[표지 및 타이틀 로고 디자인] 디자인그룹 헌드레드

_

웹툰 [황태자의 약혼녀]는 매주 화요일, 주1회 연재됩니다.

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.

Note: This manga is based on the song 虚の記憶.

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:

Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. 

High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

description.en:
Luclia is a girl who was trapped in the demon archduke's dungeon for seven years and saw ghosts. One day the prison wall collapsed and a man came.

"Wow! are you a prince?"
"Sorry, I'm just a duke."

Davier, Duke of the House of Montenfeltro. Sure enough, with his temperamental and violent personality, he would take Luclia, an unknown girl, as his princess?!

"Duke, I wonder why you brought her here..."

Luclia, who has just entered the word with the mysterious Duke Davier. Can two people understand each other and still be happy?

As a socially awkward college student, Hayeon lives a pretty boring life -- except she can communicate with outer space. One day, she meets Ujun, an alien who is curious about human nature. When she rejects his request to “borrow” her body, he takes over the body of her crush! As Hayeon helps Ujun adjust to human life, their friendship blossoms into something more. However, their love story faces many obstacles, including an alien plotting to invade Earth. What will be the fate of these star-crossed lovers?

Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

description.en:
Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs. But he will persist through many harsh battles to make Futura a better place to live!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)

♥ Support: patreon.com/teknomanga
♥ Animated Trailer: youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf

altTitles.ja: ばっどがーる

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!

altTitles.ja: わからせ♥巨娘メイドちゃん

altTitles.en: The Giant Maid Puts You in Your Place ♥

altTitles.ja: わからせ♥デカメイドちゃん

description.en:
A new maid, Elle, arrives at the mansion of Souta Kanari, a cynical little brat. Elle is a busty, beautiful and mild-mannered girl, but Souta is still scared of her. Because... Elle is over 3 meters tall! On top of that, she acts menacingly only towards Souta. Thinking back on it, Souta realized that he had bullied Elle when they were kids... What if Elle's goal is to get revenge on Souta?

The big-boned maid will make the twisted little boy understand with her big ass!
This is a slightly naughty comedy about the difference in body size. What will be Souta's fate under this aggressive attack?
description.es-la: Una nueva criada, Elle, llega a la mansión del pequeño y perverso Souta Kanari. Elle es una chica de grandes pechos, hermosa y de modales sencillos, pero Souta le tiene miedo. Porque... ¡Elle mide más de tres metros! Además, Elle sólo actúa de forma amenazante hacia Souta. Pensando en el pasado, ya que Souta había intimidado a Elle cuando era una niña... ¡Si, el objetivo de Elle es la venganza contra Souta!

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsziedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

description.en:
The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.
description.pl: Opowieść o przygodach czwórki przyjaciół. Zbieżność w numeracji rozdziałów wynika z zastosowania odmiennego niż angielska grupa systemu liczbowania dodatków – tłumaczenia są mniej więcej na tym samym etapie.
description.zh: 幼儿园里的一次合影是见一、展正希一辈子情谊的起点。一起长大的发小在校园里又遇见了贺天、莫关山这些好朋友。《19天》不仅仅是四人轻松愉快的校园日常，也是男孩们相互理解帮助最终成长的青春物语。

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: 衒学始終相談

description.en:
A space-time that gets weirder as you keep reading.
The tense dialogue between a professor and her assistant in a laboratory brimming with fishy knowledge.
What will the "Plan of the Renaissance of the Human Mind" bring forth?

altTitles.ja: 接近不可レディー

altTitles.vi: Qúy cô không thể tiếp cận

altTitles.th: เลดี้ผู้ห้ามแตะต้อง

description.en:
“Please, Hilise. Please die in place of Gabrielle.”

My always dignified brother begged me for the first time. He wants me to die for our stepsister, whom we don’t even share a drop of blood with.

“For the first and last time, I ask you this.”

I’ve always been miserable, and there is no exception this time. The seventh time that I was betrayed and killed, I was completely free of lingering feelings.

“I’m glad that you’re a scumbag until the end.”

I won’t be swayed by love anymore. It’s my turn to abandon them first.

---
Noblewoman Hillis Inoaden has had many lives so far (seven, to be exact) but she has always been regarded the same in all of them: meek, submissive, and a pest. But in her eighth resurrection, she no longer bends to the nobles that encircle her, nor does she continue to live in the shadows of her wicked brother and stepsister. With a sacred power passed down from her lineage and the title of Family Head, she sets out for revenge and to change the grave destiny that awaits her.

---
Season 1 artist: Mingsung
Season 2 artist: ZI.O

description.fr:
"Hillis, je t'en supplie, meurs à la place de Gabrielle." Untouchable Lady dépeint l'histoire de Hillis qui vit sa mort à plusieurs reprises tout en planifiant sa vengeance. 

Ricardo, un noble, supplie sa soeur Hillis de mourir pour sauver leur demi-soeur Gabrielle, avec qui elle ne partage pas la moindre goutte de sang. Hillis comprend qu'elle n'a jamais été aimée autant que cette dernière. Après être morte sept fois, et pour tenter d'échapper à son tragique destin, la douce et timide Hillis laisse place à une version d'elle implacable et avide de vengeance !
description.it:
“Per favore, Hilise. Per favore, muori al posto di Gabrielle.” Il mio dignitoso fratello mi ha supplicato per la prima volta. Vuole che muoia per la nostra sorellastra, con la quale non condividiamo nemmeno una goccia di sangue. "Per la prima e l'ultima volta, ti chiedo questo." Sono sempre stata infelice, e questa volta non c'è eccezione. La settima volta che sono stata tradita e uccisa, ero completamente libera dai sentimenti persistenti. "Sono contenta che tu sia spazzatura fino alla fine." Non sarò più influenzato dall'amore. È il mio turno di abbandonarli per primo.

---
La nobildonna Hillis Inoaden ha avuto molte vite finora, sette, per l'esattezza, ma è sempre stata considerata la stessa in tutte: mite, sottomessa e un elemento da evitare. Ma nella sua ottava resurrezione decide di non piegarsi più ai nobili che la circondano, né continua a vivere all'ombra del suo malvagio fratello e della sorellastra impertinente. Con un potere sacro tramandato dal suo lignaggio e il titolo di Capofamiglia in eredità, parte per la sua vendetta e per cambiare il grave destino che l'attende.

---

description.uk:
"Будь ласка, Хіліс, помри замість Габріель!". Мій брат вперше щось просив. Він просив померти замість зведеної сестри, з якою у нас ні краплі спільної крові. "Це моє перше і останнє прохання". Я завжди була нещасна, і цього разу також. Після сьомої смерті, коли мене зрадили, сумнівних почуттів не залишилось. "Я рада, що ти непотріб до самого кінця". Я більше не керуватимусь почуттями. Тепер моя черга відмовитись від них.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba Monogatari: Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.fr: Un cultivateur contre la société des héros

description.en: A powerful cultivator unexpectedly time-traveled into the modern world with heroes. In this small world, the fight between cultivation and superpowers shall begin…
description.fr: Un puissant cultivateur a voyagé dans le temps de façon inattendue dans le monde moderne avec des héros. Dans ce petit monde, le combat entre le cultivateur et les super héros va commencer…

description.en:
Being poor has become a sin.

The once righteous International police has now sided with the wealthy. The world has now changed into a place where money is everything.

A girl from a slum, who has spent her entire life hiding her power, faced a tragedy because of the atrocities of a devilish building owner. With nothing but a burning desire for revenge, the girl who no longer wanted to be a slave to this filthy world anymore, makes her way to the Central City checkpoint.

And there, she meets a “Santa”, a mysterious courier of presents…

Despair, sorrow, and the wishes of those who had died, the revenge play of a hero who clenched her every desire and dreams tightly within her fist.

description.de:
Manche Isekai-Storys sind unglaubliche Reisen voller Entdeckungen und persönlicher Entwicklung – aber nicht die der neu erwachten Trixie Giuseppe. Kaum fünf Minuten in ihrer Geschichte, ist sie auch schon mit dem schlimmsten Kerl aller Zeiten verheiratet und wird von ihren Eltern verstoßen. Trixie will um jeden Preis aus diesem Leben ausbrechen und nimmt verzweifelt eine Stelle als Dienstmädchen in einem abgeschiedenen Landgut an. Dort angekommen muss sie feststellen, dass der „junge Meister”, dem sie dort dienen soll, niemand Geringeres ist als der berüchtigte Leone Atarta. Scheinbar hat sich die Autorin der Geschichte ordentlich vertan, denn der gute Leone benimmt sich nicht nur ungehobelt, sondern voll und ganz wie ein wildes Tier. So beginnt Trixies Unterfangen, ihr neues Schoßhündchen zu zähmen und ihn in den perfekten Prinzen zu verwandeln, der er eigentlich hätte sein sollen.

---

description.en:
Some people start off their possession stories on an epic journey of discovery and growth–but not the newly awakened Trixie Giuseppe. She’s not even five minutes into her novel but is already married to the biggest creep ever and disowned by her parents. Wishing to free herself from the shackles placed by her awful husband, Trixie takes a job as a servant at a remote estate. But she discovers too late that the “young master” she has to serve is the empire’s foolish prince, Leone Atarta. The novel’s author must’ve misspelled the word “feral” as Leone turns out to be much more of a beast than a simple beauty. And thus begins Trixie’s tale of trying to tame her new “dog” and make him the shining crown prince he’s meant to be.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque les gens se réveillent dans un roman, c'est généralement pour eux le début d'incroyables aventures pleines de découvertes et d'épanouissement personnel... mais pour Trixie Guiseppe, on est loin du compte. Tout juste cinq minutes après son arrivée dans l'histoire, elle se retrouve mariée au pire goujat qui soit et reniée par ses parents! Rêvant de s'émanciper de son horrible époux, Trixie accepte de travailler en tant que servante dans un domaine loin de la capitale. Lorsqu'elle apprend que le «jeune maître» qu'elle doit servir est en fait le stupide prince de l'empire, Léone Atarta, il est malheureusement trop tard pour faire demi-tour... et comme si ce n'était pas suffisant, elle découvre qu'il tient plus de la bête que du prince charmant! Alors que sa survie-même est en jeu, Trixie parviendra-t-elle à dompter son nouveau «chien» et le transformer en merveilleux prince héritier...?

description.ko:
“일당 10골드 이상. 1년 만근 시 결혼 기록 말소와 저택. 어떻습니까.” 

쓰레기 남편과 결혼해 가문에서 쫓겨난 소설 속 엑스트라에 최악의 빙의 후 
꿀 같은 평생직장이 나타났다. 

짐승에게 길러져서 강아지처럼 행동하는 백치 황자를 돌보는 일 따위, 
프로 애견인에게 어렵지 않다고! 

돈만 벌고 적당할 때 도망치려고 했는데…. 

"가지 마, 트릭시." 

길들인 강아지가 자꾸만 나를 잡는다. 

"아무것도 해주지 않아도 돼." 
"앞으로는 내가 뭐든 해줄 테니까." 

게다가 강아지인 줄 알았는데 알고 보니 늑대…? 

"트릭시는 나만의 주인이잖아." 

이러다가 진짜 잡아먹히는 거 아니야?!

description.en:
When he was a child, his father was said to have died from a car accident. But what actually caused his death was ‘Medical Negligence’.
Ever since that, his dream was to become a ‘Perfect Doctor’ that would never deny or mistreat a patient.

However, reality was harsh.
His mother was inflicted with an incurable disease, which required a lot of money. He quit his university hospital internship and became a sell-out dermatologist.

While he had stopped in his tracks due to the harshness of reality, a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence, ‘A.I. – Ronnie’, came to him.
And thus, his journey to become a perfect doctor started once again.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dqr0lp4pDiY)
description.ko:
어릴 적, 아버지가 교통사고를 당했다.
아버지를 죽음으로 몰아간 것은 바로 '의료 방임'.
그 뒤 나의 꿈은 어떤 환자도 거절하지 않는 '만능 의사'가 되는 것이다.

하지만 현실은 가혹했다.
어머니의 불치병, 그로 인해 필요해진 돈.
대학 병원 인턴을 그만둔 나는 피부과 페이닥터로 근근이 살아가고 있었다.

현실의 벽에 멈춰선 나에게 어느 날 최첨단 인공지능 'AI-로니'가 찾아왔다.
인턴부터 다시 시작하게 된 만능 의사의 길.

이번에는 해낼 수 있어.
로니가 있으니까.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dqr0lp4pDiY)
description.ru:
В детстве ему говорили, что отец погиб в автокатастрофе. Однако на самом деле, он умер из-за "Медицинской халатности". С того самого момента мальчик обзавелся мечтой стать "Идеальный врачом", который никогда не откажет пациенту.

Но реальность жесткая штука. Его мать заболела неизлечимой болезнью и для поддержания жизни нужны были огромные деньги, поэтому герой бросает институт и становится продажным дерматологом.

Он уже думал, что мечте не суждено сбыться,
но появление искусственного интеллекта нового поколения "И.И - Рони" может всё изменить...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dqr0lp4pDiY)
description.pt-br:
Quando era criança, disseram que seu pai havia morrido em um acidente de carro. Mas na verdade, a causa de sua morte foi 'Negligência Médica'. Desde então, seu sonho era se tornar um 'Médico Perfeito' que nunca negaria ou maltrataria um paciente.

No entanto, a realidade foi cruel. Sua mãe foi acometida por uma doença incurável que exigia muito dinheiro. Ele abandonou seu estágio no hospital universitário e se tornou um dermatologista vendido.

Enquanto ele havia parado devido à crueldade da realidade, uma Inteligência Artificial de ponta, 'A.I. - Ronnie', veio até ele. E assim, sua jornada para se tornar um médico perfeito começou novamente.

シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

altTitles.ja: 8歳から始める魔法学

altTitles.en: Studying magic from the age of 8

description.en:
Roy Aveillam, from a notorious ducal family, is feared by everyone around him for his irreverent and arrogant attitude. However, in the midst of the turmoil with his classmate Van, he regains his "memory of his previous life" and his "desire"! It was a wish to "master something and become special.

And then, Roy has an even more special encounter.He meets someone who has magic in this world! At the age of 8, he awakens to "magic" and aims to turn his life around with the help of his many encounters!
description.ja:
悪名高い公爵家出身のロイ・アヴェイラムは、不遜かつ尊大な態度で周囲から恐れられていた。しかし、クラスメイトの少年ヴァンとの騒動の渦中で“前世の記憶”と抱いていた“想い”を取り戻す――！それは『何かを極め、特別になりたい』という願い。

そして、ロイはさらに特別な出会いを果たす。

「出会えたぞ…この世界には魔法がある――！」

8歳にして“魔法学”に目覚めた少年は多くの出会いを糧にして人生逆転を目指す!!
description.ru: Мальчик Рой — пресловутый княжеский сын, которого боятся из-за его окружения и заносчивости. Однажды из-за несчастного случая он вспоминает свою прошлую жизнь и своё желание: «Я хочу стать особенным хоть в чём-то!». Решив, что эта жизнь — его шанс, Рой начинает изучение магии.

In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"

description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

description.en: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party.  Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world.  It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.  The story of trying to be the strongest in another world begins
description.pt-br: Um homem de armadura com o poder das trevas, Ares o Cavaleiro das trevas,estava indo para o Castelo do Rei Demônio como membro do Brave Party. Com a esperança de derrotar o Rei Demônio e fazer um retorno triunfante à cidade natal de Lulua, a sábia e irmã mais nova do herói… E no meio da batalha final, no momento em que Ares desfere um golpe sombrio… com sinais de estar sendo levado a algum lugar, do nada algo o leva para outro mundo. Parece que você foi pego em uma batalha real, na qual pessoas fortes de vários mundos participam!? Para voltar ao mundo original com Lulua, que foi separada, o cavaleiro das trevas Ares luta. A história de tentar ser o mais forte em outro mundo começa!

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.

description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en:
Taepung Shin knows every nook and cranny of his favorite MMO video game Paradiso like it was the back of his hand! However, his gaming adventures suffer an abrupt end after his untimely death. But this is not his last hurrah since he’s reincarnated as Jared, a delinquent lord of a frozen province… in Paradiso! Now, he must brave the world he loved and take advantage of all glitches he knows about and turn himself into the main character of his new solo adventure!

description.fr:
Trop d’heures sup + un jeu vidéo non-stop = game over, décès assuré ! Ce qu’il n’avait pas prévu, c’est de se réveiller dans son jeu vidéo favori… en tant que roi inconnu d’un fief carrément à la dérive. Pas grave, en tant qu’expert du jeu, il va pouvoir utiliser tous les bugs pour s’améliorer, tout ça en un rien de temps ! Et surtout, être sûr que son royaume (et lui accessoirement) survivra lorsque la “Grande Guerre” éclatera.

과도한 업무와 밤샘 게임으로 돌연사?!
눈을 뜬 나를 반긴 것은 게임 <파라디소>의 세계관 속이었다.

그것도 초고도비만의 몸뚱이와 몰락하기 일보직전의 완벽한 듣보잡 엑스트라 영주. 자레드의 몸으로 환생했다!

망할! 소설이나 영화 속 주인공들은 존잘남으로 태어나서 호의호식하며 잘 살던데!

“반드시 정점을 차지하겠어!”

성공하고 성장 할 수 있다면!
버그든 꼼수든 무엇이든 OK!

자레드의 혹독한 다이어트와 버그로 꿀빠는 치열한 현생 도전기가 시작된다!

description.th:
เมื่อเซียนเกม 'พาราดิโซ' อย่างผม โหมงานและเล่นเกมอย่างหนักจนต้องมาจบชีวิตจากการพักผ่อนน้อยนั้น ได้มาถือกำเนิดขึ้นมาใหม่ในร่างของ 'จาเร็ด' ท่านลอร์ดแห่งอาณาจักรคลิเวียที่อยู่ในเกมพาราดิโซ

ทว่าร่างกายของผมในตอนนี้เป็นร่างตุ้ยนุ้ย ไม่เอาการเอางานจนอาณาจักรเละเทะ และความซวยสุดๆ อยู่ที่ในอีก 10 ปีให้หลัง จะมีมหาศึกเทพชนมารอุบัติขึ้น ที่ทำให้ทั่วทั้งทวีปตกอยู่ในความโกลาหล

การจะลดความอ้วนและเพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งให้กับตัวเองภายในเวลาอันสั้นนั้นไม่มีทางเป็นไปไม่ได้แน่! นอกจากจะใช้บั๊กและสูตรโกงจากในเกมมาช่วยทำให้ผมกลายเป็นผู้กล้าที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดในทวีปได้ยังไงล่ะ!
